message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this product. Given its value, I'm proposing a starting price of $20,000. I'm open to discussing this further, so please let me know your thoughts.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I understand the value of the product, but I am only willing to pay up to $15,000 for it. I hope we can come to an agreement that works for both of us.
Hi Bob, thanks for your response. I understand your position, but I can't sell the product for less than $18,000. This is already a competitive price considering its value. What do you think?

Hello Alice, I appreciate your response. While I understand the value of the product, I am still not able to justify paying more than $15,000 for it. I hope we can find a middle ground that respects both our positions.
